languages.text: {n}Беспокойно измерив шагами кабинет, Кассия наконец сдержанно произносит:{/n} "Я много думала о произошедшем. Много думала... о нас. Возможно, я действительно нравлюсь вам. Быть может, и вы мне нравитесь тоже. Но мы..."{n}, — она запинается, -{/n}"Нам не суждено стать чем-то большим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Беспокойно измерив шагами кабинет, Кассия наконец сдержанно произносит:{/n} "Я много думала о произошедшем. Много думала... о нас. Возможно, я действительно нравлюсь вам. Быть может, и вы мне нравитесь тоже. Но мы..." {n}, — она запинается, -{/n} "Нам не суждено стать чем-то большим".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

Быть может, и вы мне нравитесь тоже. Но мы..."{n}, — она запинается, -{/n}"Нам не суждено стать чем-то большим".

languages.text: {n}卡西娅忧心忡忡地在书房里踱了几步，之后故作平静地开口道。{/n}“我想了很多事情，包括最近发生的一切，还有……我们之间发生的一切。或许你对我有好感，我也对你有好感，但我们……”{n}她的声音低落下去。{/n}“我们不该再继续发展下去了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅忧心忡忡地在书房里踱了几步，之后故作平静地开口道。{/n}“我想了很多事情，包括最近发生的一切，还有……我们之间发生的一切。或许你对我有好感，我也对你有好感，但我们……”{n}她的声音低落下去。{/n}“我们不该再继续发展下去了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia macht ein paar nervöse Schritte durch das Arbeitszimmer und sagt dann in reserviertem Ton:{/n} "Ich habe viel über alles nachgedacht. Und über ... uns. Vielleicht empfindet Ihr in der Tat etwas für mich. Vielleicht empfinde ich auch etwas für Euch. Doch wir ..." {n}Sie stockt.{/n} "Wir sind nicht dazu bestimmt, dass mehr aus uns wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia macht ein paar nervöse Schritte durch das Arbeitszimmer und sagt dann in reserviertem Ton:{/n} "Ich habe viel über alles nachgedacht. Und über ... uns. Vielleicht empfindet Ihr in der Tat etwas für mich. Vielleicht empfinde ich auch etwas für Euch. Doch wir ..." {n}Sie stockt.{/n} "Wir sind nicht dazu bestimmt, dass mehr aus uns wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia fait quelques pas anxieux dans le bureau, puis annonce nerveusement :{/n} « J'ai beaucoup réfléchi à tout ce qui s'est passé. Et... à ce qu'il y a entre nous. Peut-être avez-vous vraiment des sentiments pour moi. Peut-être en ai-je moi aussi pour vous. Mais nous... » {n}Elle hésite avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Notre relation n'est pas vouée à aller plus loin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia fait quelques pas anxieux dans le bureau, puis annonce nerveusement :{/n} « J'ai beaucoup réfléchi à tout ce qui s'est passé. Et... à ce qu'il y a entre nous. Peut-être avez-vous vraiment des sentiments pour moi. Peut-être en ai-je moi aussi pour vous. Mais nous... » {n}Elle hésite avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Notre relation n'est pas vouée à aller plus loin. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia da unos pasos ansiosa por el estudio y dice:{/n} «He pensado mucho en todo lo que ha pasado. Y... en nosotros. Tal vez sienta algo por mí. Tal vez yo sienta algo por usted. Pero...». {n}Titubea.{/n} «No estamos destinados a convertirnos en algo más».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia da unos pasos ansiosa por el estudio y dice:{/n} «He pensado mucho en todo lo que ha pasado. Y... en nosotros. Tal vez sienta algo por mí. Tal vez yo sienta algo por usted. Pero...». {n}Titubea.{/n} «No estamos destinados a convertirnos en algo más».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは書斎の周りを不安げな足取りで数歩めぐり、控え目に言う。{/n}「あたくしはこれまでに起こったこと、それと…我々について、たくさん考えました。たぶん{name}様には本当に、あたくしへの思いがあるのでしょう。たぶんあたくしも同様に、{name}様への思いがあります。ですが我々は…」{n}彼女はためらう。{/n}「我々は、これ以上になる運命にはないと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは書斎の周りを不安げな足取りで数歩めぐり、控え目に言う。{/n}「あたくしはこれまでに起こったこと、それと…我々について、たくさん考えました。たぶん{name}様には本当に、あたくしへの思いがあるのでしょう。たぶんあたくしも同様に、{name}様への思いがあります。ですが我々は…」{n}彼女はためらう。{/n}「我々は、これ以上になる運命にはないと思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, çalışma odası içinde birkaç kaygılı adım atıyor ve ardından çekinerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Olanlar hakkında bir hayli düşündüm. Bizim... Hakkımızda. Belki de sahiden bana karşı hislerin vardır. Belki de bu hislerin karşılıksız değildir. Ancak biz..." {n}Duraksıyor.{/n} "Biz birlikte olamayız."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia takes a few anxious steps around the study, then says reservedly,{/n} "I have given much thought to all that has happened. And... to us. Perhaps you do indeed have feelings for me. Perhaps I have feelings for you in turn. But we..." {n}She falters.{/n} "We are not meant to become something more."
